name: PDF (Portable Document Format), version 1.6
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">pdf</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated. A general document representation language. PDF represents formatted, page-oriented documents. Version 1.6 is dated Nov 2004, and associated with Acrobat and Adobe Reader 7.
